programme.title: Broken Molds
programme.desc: Take an inside look at the origins of windsurfing and how it became one of the world's fastest growing sports. (71 minutes)

programme.title: The Art of Flight
programme.desc: Travis Rice and Curt Morgan's follow-up to That's It, That's All raises the bar of snowboarding, again. (77 minutes)

programme.title: Magic Hour
programme.desc: The 'magic hour' provides the perfect light to capture stunning images in the mountains. (71 minutes)

programme.title: Here, Hold My Kid
programme.desc: Two pro skiers, two new mums, one sponsorship: a film about the highs and lows of two women aiming to succeed. (39 minutes)

programme.title: Aloha Mr Lenny

programme.desc: Kai Lenny travels to Nazaré in Portugal to train with Brazilian big wave charger Lucas 'Chumbo' Chianca. (15 minutes)

programme.title: Slaying Gigantes
programme.desc: Kai Lenny competes in the Gigantes de Nazaré contest before jetting home to catch a great day at Peahi (Jaws). (21 minutes)

programme.title: Redemption at Nazaré
programme.desc: The Big Wave World Tour tow surfing event is on at Nazaré – Kai Lenny‘s last chance to get a win this winter. (20 minutes)

programme.title: Changing of the guard

programme.title: 2018's best runs
